allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
feat: Remove z prefix from folders and files - Phase 2

Major restructuring:
- zbom → bookmarks
- zgen → gen
- zmaas → maas
- zpath → path
- ztatilde → tatilde
- ztatiltr → tatiltr
- zqa → qa
- zbanka → banka
- zsigorta → sigorta2
- zvatandas → vatandas
- zbizkimiz → bizkimiz
- zoparayaben → oparayaben
- zparatransfer → paratransfer
- zats → ats \(copied due to lock\)

Updated all references in HTML, JS, CSS files
Updated sitemap.xml and canonical URLs
Added GoatCounter to getgot.html
Created araclar.md with tool descriptions
Created sondurum file

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
chore: Remove old zats folder \(replaced by ats\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
